- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test addition/improvement

## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have checked for and removed any hardcoded paths

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this on multiple environments (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have updated relevant ADRs (if architectural changes)
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments

### Dependencies

- [ ] My changes require no new dependencies
- [ ] OR: I have documented new dependencies in README.md
- [ ] OR: I have added new dependencies to requirements.txt/package.json

### Breaking Changes

- [ ] This PR introduces no breaking changes
- [ ] OR: I have documented breaking changes in CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] OR: I have updated the migration guide

## Reviewer Checklist

For reviewers:

- [ ] Code quality is acceptable
- [ ] Tests are adequate
- [ ] Documentation is updated
- [ ] No security concerns
- [ ] Performance impact is acceptable
- [ ] Breaking changes are documented
